name: i await the knife
description:
content warning: gender dysphoria, mentions of suicide and trans health care.

Note: if you return to this story and there are no timers or dates displaying you might need to restart within the story since reloading your page won't reload the story fully. 

100% of all donations to this game will go to  Trans Lifeline or donate directly.

Thanks go to Isaac, my best friend and supporter who was the first to playtest this with me and pushed through my insecurities about publishing all these big sad feelings. 
And all my beautiful amazing friends and strong family, it's been really tough and exciting but having a strong support network like you all makes me _know_ I'll be okay at the end of the day.
To all my fellow queers that show me everyday our existence is resistance. Ya'll are alive and thriving and fuel me with the strength to take on another glorious day.
And to you, for playing with me and for in this moment, sharing your time with me.

(photo: me thriving at a particularly spectacular mirror reflection in a forest reservoir)
